department: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT)
description: A multi-domain challenge and a 24-hour hackathon focusing on innovation in mobility, specifically covering contests in Electric Vehicles, Drones, Hardware Innovation, Software Innovation, and general Student Innovation.

contact_persons.name: Dr. R. S. R. KRISHNAM NAIDU

target_audience: Students, particularly those interested in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, innovation, electric vehicles, and drones.
additional_info: Organized by Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT) in association with IEEE, Morris Garages, and Institution's Innovation Council (Ministry of I&B Initiative). NSRIT's Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering is accredited by NBA under Tier I. Scan QR code for registration. Instagram handle: @nsrit_eee_club. Website: www.nsrit.edu.in.
